lead_paragraph: Petrobras, the state-controlled oil company at the heart of a bribe scandal, is to get $7 billion in financing as part of a large Chinese investment.

headline.print_headline: Chinese Plan Investments and Loans for Brazil
headline.main: Chinese Plan Investments and Loans for Brazil

snippet: Petrobras, the state-controlled oil company at the heart of a bribe scandal, is to get $7 billion in financing as part of a large Chinese investment.
abstract: China unveils list of billions of dollars in investment programs and loans for Brazil; Petrobras, entangled in bribery scandal, will get $7 billion in financing; railroad project is envisioned to cut through Amazon rain forest.
